title: When A Hobby Opens A New World
description:
Cindy Dick was rummaging through boxes at a yard sale when she came across a very unique sports card. It ignited a fire in her that led to a lifelong hobby.

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
